summary: This is an email from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019, providing and correcting staff rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. It lists Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants, but all specific names are redacted. The document appears to be internal jail administration communication.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: Federal jail facility where the email originates; location of the staff rosters.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the Associate Warden of MCC New York dated August 10, 2019.
It transmits and corrects staff rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, indicating operational planning.
All specific staff names (Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants) are fully redacted in the provided text.
The email corrects a prior error, changing a staff title from 'Senior Officer' to 'Material Handler Supervisor'.
The correspondence originates from a federal detention facility shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and death in custody.
